text: Richard P. Guidry, known as Dick Guidry (September 22, 1929 â€“ March 26, 2014)Staff (March 26) "Legendary Lafourche politician dies," Houma Today (Houma, La.) March 26, 2014 captured at 9:44 pm CST. http://www.houmatoday.com/article/20140326/HURBLOG/140329617/0/PREPS?p=1&tc;=pg was a businessman from Galliano, Louisiana. He is a Democrat. He is a former member of the Louisiana House of Representatives from Lafourche Parish. He is thought to be the youngest member ever elected to the Louisiana House. Guidry died in New Orleans, Louisiana, aged 84. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Businesspeople from Louisiana Category:Politicians from Louisiana Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Members of the Louisiana State Legislature
title: Dick Guidry
